com.cubeia.firebase.api.game.table
Interface TableSeatingMap

public interface TableSeatingMap

THis map contains references between players and their current seat at a particular table. Seats are identified by index, and the indexing starts at zero.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson

Method Summary
 int countSeatedPlayers()
          This method iterates through all available seats and counts the number of seated players.
 int getFirstVacantSeat()
          This method iterates all available seats and returns the first vacant seat index.
 int getNumberOfSeats()
          This method returns the number of seats at a table.
 Seat<GenericPlayer> getSeat(int seatId)
          This method returns a seat object from the map.
 boolean hasVacantSeats()
          This method checks if any seats at the table are vacant.
 boolean isSeatVacant(int seatId)
          This method returns true if a specific seat is vacant.
 

Method Detail

getNumberOfSeats

int getNumberOfSeats()
This method returns the number of seats at a table.

Returns:
The number of seats at the table

getFirstVacantSeat

int getFirstVacantSeat()
This method iterates all available seats and returns the first vacant seat index. If no seats are vacant this method return -1.

Returns:
The first available seat, or -1

isSeatVacant

boolean isSeatVacant(int seatId)
This method returns true if a specific seat is vacant. The seats are indexed by zero.

Parameters:
seatId - Seat id, indexed from zero
Returns:
True if the seat is vacant, -1 if not or if it does not exist

getSeat

Seat<GenericPlayer> getSeat(int seatId)
This method returns a seat object from the map. Seats are indexed by zero. If the seat does not exist, null will be returned.

Parameters:
seatId - Seat id, indexed from zero
Returns:
A seat object, or null if not found

countSeatedPlayers

int countSeatedPlayers()
This method iterates through all available seats and counts the number of seated players.

Returns:
The number of seated players

hasVacantSeats

boolean hasVacantSeats()
This method checks if any seats at the table are vacant.

Returns:
True if the table has a vacant seat, false otherwise
